MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW10 postcode area of Middlewich, affecting properties in Long Lane, Longwood Close and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  4.10pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:20pm on the 17th November 2020.
